title: Burning Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of Burning Elements!

This package contains 12 Burning Elements sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/YPfl1f4FjpI


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Fire 01_#[512,288] 4096 × 2880

● Fire 02_#[512,288] 4096 × 2880

● Fire 03_#[512,288] 4096 × 2880

● Fire 04_#[512,288] 3072 × 2304

● Fire 05_#[512,288] 3584 × 2592

● Fire 06_#[512,288] 4096 × 2880

● Fire 07_#[512,288] 4096 × 2880

● Fire 08_#[512,288] 4608 × 3168

● Fire 09_#[512,288] 2048 × 1440

● Fire 10_#[512,288] 3072 × 2016

● Fire 11_#[512,288] 5120 × 3168

● Fire 12_#[512,288] 4096 × 2880


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
